email_chain.subject: Freight Offer for Coal Shipment - MV OCEAN WAVE
email_chain.body:
Dear Julia,

I hope this message finds you well. We have the MV OCEAN WAVE (DWT: 95,000, LOA: 230m) available for a coal shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai. The cargo size is 80,000MT on CIF terms. Our starting freight quote is USD 18.50 per tonne. Laycan is 15-20 October. Please let me know your thoughts.

Best regards,
Alex Morgan

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Coal Shipment - MV OCEAN WAVE
email_chain.body:
Hi Alex,

Thank you for the offer. USD 18.50 seems a bit high given the current market. Can you do better? Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate per day?

Best regards,
Julia Ramos

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Coal Shipment - MV OCEAN WAVE
email_chain.body:
Hi Julia,

I can offer USD 18.00 per tonne. The demurrage rate is USD 15,000 per day. Let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Alex Morgan

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Coal Shipment - MV OCEAN WAVE
email_chain.body:
Hi Alex,

USD 18.00 is better, but can we push it to USD 17.75? Also, can we adjust the laycan to 17-22 October?

Best regards,
Julia Ramos

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Coal Shipment - MV OCEAN WAVE
email_chain.body:
Hi Julia,

USD 17.75 is possible. Laycan adjusted to 17-22 October. Please confirm.

Best regards,
Alex Morgan

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Coal Shipment - MV OCEAN WAVE
email_chain.body:
Hi Alex,

Confirmed. Please send the summary of terms.

Best regards,
Julia Ramos

email_chain.subject: Summary of Terms - MV OCEAN WAVE
email_chain.body:
Dear Julia,

Here's the summary:
- Vessel: MV OCEAN WAVE
- Cargo: 80,000MT Coal
- Load Port: Newcastle
- Discharge Port: Shanghai
- Laycan: 17-22 October
- Freight: USD 17.75 per tonne
- Demurrage: USD 15,000 per day
- Incoterm: CIF

Please confirm.

Best regards,
Alex Morgan
